title: Mark Lamb (sheriff)
added: Following the [[storming of the U.S. Capitol]] by supporters of [[Donald Trump]] in January 2021, Lamb spoke at a rally where he said the riot was not Trump's fault but rather caused by "the other issues that have happened â€“ the [[Hillary Clinton]]s that have gone unpunished".<ref>{{cite web|url=https://eu.azcentral.com/story/news/politics/arizona/2021/01/07/these-arizona-republicans-say-trump-isnt-to-blame-for-capitol-riot/6580354002/|title=Among some in Arizona GOP, siege of the US Capitol was everyone's fault except Trump|date=January 7, 2021|access-date=February 6, 2021|work=[[The Arizona Republic]]|first=Andrew|last=Oxford}}</ref>
